title: thunderbird
content: Hi Had an old computer with passwords but has died trying to restart ThunderBird but can't find old password. How can I change the password please .. Ross Email to [edited from public forum] @gmail thanks
creator: helen.whitcombe

title: In Thunderbird, mapping Outlook folders to GMail folders
content: Have 2 email accounts that Thunderbird picks up: Outlook and GMail. Would like to push EVERYTHING downloaded to Outlook folders (from Outlook.live.com) to my GMail account folders. Seems like it should be easy, but I'm not having good success. Can anyone help or point me in the right direction?
creator: dalewebb1

title: Forgotten password
content:
Earlier this year I downloaded Thunderbird and started trying to use it. Early on, I somehow set a password and I am not able to remember that password. So, at that time, I uninstalled Thunderbird and continued using my old Outlook 2016.

Recently, I realized that End of Life for Outlook 2016 was near or already here. So, I decided to try Thunderbird again. HOWEVER, Thunderbird still keeps prompting me for passwords – apparently looking back at my previous installation.

I would REALLY like to get out of my MS connection and continue with Thunderbird, but I am frustrated and can’t get in enough to reset the password/

All assistance and guidance will be very much appreciated.
creator: phlcpa
